system.descriptor: Entertain or Enthrall groups of Spectators, takes an amount of time dependant on Performance.
system.uses:
Use: Charming Performance. -10 Performer (Storyteller/Singer) Test instead of Charm, improving disposition of audience by one level, or +5 to Crew Morale ( +10 per DoS) for duration of combat. 
Use: Enthralling Performance, -10 Performer(Musician/Singer) Test instead of Blather, distracting audience, doesn't mean completley unaware in the face of obvious danger or harm against them.
Skill Groups: Dancer, Musician, Singer, Storyteller
